title: The 20 Best Memorial Day Deals From Nordstrom’s Half-Yearly Sale
description: Fashion editors never miss this one—the deals are that good.
excerpt: The best Memorial Day deals from Nordstrom are happening now as part of its Half-Yearly Sale. We found Reformation, Damson Madder, and Skims for up to 40 percent off.
text: Veronica Beard Annette Slide SandalThe perfect suede sandal does exist—and it’s on sale. This versatile style is bound to sell out, so don’t leave it lingering in your cart for long.Damson Madder Mia Tie Neck Strapless Midi DressThe drapey bow on this Damson Madder dress can also be worn criss-crossed around your neck, so you’ll never get bored of wearing it. Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowLe Specs Mermaiden 52mm Rectangular SunglassesAt 70 percent off, these sleek Le Specs sunglasses practically add themselves to your cart. Stella McCartney Perforated Logo Faux Leather ToteReady to invest in a new work bag? This timeless Stella McCartney tote is worth the splurge.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowPuma Palermo SneakerMeet your new go-to sneaker: the Puma Palermo. The low-top silhouette can be styled all the same ways as your Sambas, but the colors make it feel fresh. Sandro Floral Motif Smocked TopLive out your White Lotus fantasies (your sartorial ones, that is) this summer in this vegetal Sandro top. Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowBobbi Brown Crushed Lip Color Moisturizing LipstickThe hydrating formula of this Bobbi Brown lipstick revives dry lips while leaving behind a gentle wash of color. A plethora of nude shades are currently discounted right now.Montce Jacelyn One-Piece SwimsuitThis Montce one-piece doubles as a tank bodysuit when paired with a flowy maxi skirt or denim cutoffs—meaning it’ll save space in your suitcase while maximizing your vacation outfit options. Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowReformation Anna Rugby Crop Knit TopGently lean into this season’s preppy, nautical aesthetic with this striped Reformation rugby shirt that pairs effortlessly with denim cutoffs. St. Moran Freshwater Pearl Pendant Curb Chain NecklaceA single, dainty freshwater pearl brings a summery touch to this layerable St. Moran chain. It’s the easiest graduation gift you’ll ever find, too. Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowBugatti Singapore 2-Piece Hardside Luggage SetAirline travel is stressful these days. Take one worry off your plate by upgrading your old, busted suitcase with this 2-piece set from Bugatti.Favorite Daughter The Diana JacketA refreshing take on a classic, this Favorite Daughter blazer is a work wardrobe staple you’ll get countless wears out of. The collarless silhouette is a playground for summery statement necklaces. Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowVersace Small Greca Leather Hobo BagThis keep-forever Versace bag is 40 percent off at the moment—need we say more?Tom Ford Vanilla Sex Eau de ParfumYes, Tom Ford’s scent smells as alluring as its name suggests. In addition to vanilla, it features notes of sandalwood and almond for a hint of sweetness and nuttiness that make it hard to resist. Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowRag & Bone Flexi Sofie Wide Leg JeansThese high-rise, wide-leg Rag & Bone jeans are cut from super soft, stretchy denim that you’ll want to wear day in and day out. Good thing the silhouette pairs equally well with tanks and sandals as it does with sweaters and boots. Balenciaga Small Monaco Camera Crossbody BagBalenciaga bags are classic investments. You’ll be able to use this one as an anchor piece in your wardrobe for a decade plus.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowTheory Cotton Oversized Double-Breasted Trench CoatThis chic Theory trench will carry you through the last few days of spring—and it’ll be there waiting for you when temperatures dip in early fall.Skims Stretch Cotton Jersey BodysuitSkims fans, now’s the time to stock up on basics. Dozens of the brand’s staple pieces are currently on sale, including this simple white bodysuit.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowHavaianas Point Flip-FlopIt’s time to snag yourself a pair of Gigi Hadid’s go-to Havaianas flip-flops, now that pool season is in full swing.Mulberry Pimlico Shiny Croc Embossed Leather SatchelBoth Meghan Markle and Kate Middleton are known Mulberry fans. Take their word for it and wear this sleek croc carry-all over your shoulder.
html:
Veronica Beard Annette Slide Sandal

The perfect suede sandal does exist—and it’s on sale. This versatile style is bound to sell out, so don’t leave it lingering in your cart for long.

Damson Madder Mia Tie Neck Strapless Midi Dress

The drapey bow on this Damson Madder dress can also be worn criss-crossed around your neck, so you’ll never get bored of wearing it.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Le Specs Mermaiden 52mm Rectangular Sunglasses

At 70 percent off, these sleek Le Specs sunglasses practically add themselves to your cart.

Stella McCartney Perforated Logo Faux Leather Tote

Ready to invest in a new work bag? This timeless Stella McCartney tote is worth the splurge.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Puma Palermo Sneaker

Meet your new go-to sneaker: the Puma Palermo. The low-top silhouette can be styled all the same ways as your Sambas, but the colors make it feel fresh.

Sandro Floral Motif Smocked Top

Live out your White Lotus fantasies (your sartorial ones, that is) this summer in this vegetal Sandro top.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Bobbi Brown Crushed Lip Color Moisturizing Lipstick

The hydrating formula of this Bobbi Brown lipstick revives dry lips while leaving behind a gentle wash of color. A plethora of nude shades are currently discounted right now.

Montce Jacelyn One-Piece Swimsuit

This Montce one-piece doubles as a tank bodysuit when paired with a flowy maxi skirt or denim cutoffs—meaning it’ll save space in your suitcase while maximizing your vacation outfit options.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Reformation Anna Rugby Crop Knit Top

Gently lean into this season’s preppy, nautical aesthetic with this striped Reformation rugby shirt that pairs effortlessly with denim cutoffs.

St. Moran Freshwater Pearl Pendant Curb Chain Necklace

A single, dainty freshwater pearl brings a summery touch to this layerable St. Moran chain. It’s the easiest graduation gift you’ll ever find, too.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Bugatti Singapore 2-Piece Hardside Luggage Set

Airline travel is stressful these days. Take one worry off your plate by upgrading your old, busted suitcase with this 2-piece set from Bugatti.

Favorite Daughter The Diana Jacket

A refreshing take on a classic, this Favorite Daughter blazer is a work wardrobe staple you’ll get countless wears out of. The collarless silhouette is a playground for summery statement necklaces.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Versace Small Greca Leather Hobo Bag

This keep-forever Versace bag is 40 percent off at the moment—need we say more?

Tom Ford Vanilla Sex Eau de Parfum

Yes, Tom Ford’s scent smells as alluring as its name suggests. In addition to vanilla, it features notes of sandalwood and almond for a hint of sweetness and nuttiness that make it hard to resist.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Rag & Bone Flexi Sofie Wide Leg Jeans

These high-rise, wide-leg Rag & Bone jeans are cut from super soft, stretchy denim that you’ll want to wear day in and day out. Good thing the silhouette pairs equally well with tanks and sandals as it does with sweaters and boots.

Balenciaga Small Monaco Camera Crossbody Bag

Balenciaga bags are classic investments. You’ll be able to use this one as an anchor piece in your wardrobe for a decade plus.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Theory Cotton Oversized Double-Breasted Trench Coat

This chic Theory trench will carry you through the last few days of spring—and it’ll be there waiting for you when temperatures dip in early fall.

Skims Stretch Cotton Jersey Bodysuit

Skims fans, now’s the time to stock up on basics. Dozens of the brand’s staple pieces are currently on sale, including this simple white bodysuit.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Havaianas Point Flip-Flop

It’s time to snag yourself a pair of Gigi Hadid’s go-to Havaianas flip-flops, now that pool season is in full swing.

Mulberry Pimlico Shiny Croc Embossed Leather Satchel

Both Meghan Markle and Kate Middleton are known Mulberry fans. Take their word for it and wear this sleek croc carry-all over your shoulder.
